Text: Hi Guys, according to AVG free RedRack.dll is infected with Trojan 'BackDoor.Hupigon5.ATIU'

u can still download and single out the trojen and delete it, but deleting it could mean u wont get to use the infected plugin. 

cheers beers big ears!
AVG sucks.  I hope you all realize, if Microsoft is not getting money off of it, it is going to be a virus.
I just downloaded it...and every time when i try to open cubase ,it crashes....have any ideea? thanks.

To deniro7: I found out the same way as you that Cubase crashes when there are too many plugins in the Steinberg vst folder. Clean it out, put in the ones that you really want. If you want to check out all the dlls just do it a few at a time. Works great.
